Invalid transcription state.

- `transcription_invalid_state`:

delete.description: Permanently deletes a transcription and its associated files. Cannot delete transcriptions that are currently processing.

409.description:
Invalid transcription state.

- `transcription_invalid_state`:

  - File transcription has failed.
  - Transcript no longer available.

limit.description: Maximum number of files to return.
limit.title: Limit

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for the next page of results.
cursor.title: Cursor

size.description: Size of the file in bytes.
size.title: Size

created_at.description: UTC timestamp indicating when the file was uploaded.
created_at.title: Created At

next_page_cursor.description: A pagination token that references the next page of results. When more data is available, this field contains a value to pass in the cursor parameter of a subsequent request. When null, no additional results are available.
next_page_cursor.title: Next Page Cursor

client_reference_id.description: Optional tracking identifier string. Does not need to be unique.
client_reference_id.title: Client Reference Id

limit.description: Maximum number of transcriptions to return.
limit.title: Limit

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for the next page of results.
cursor.title: Cursor

next_page_cursor.description: A pagination token that references the next page of results. When more data is available, this field contains a value to pass in the cursor parameter of a subsequent request. When null, no additional results are available.
next_page_cursor.title: Next Page Cursor

id.description: Unique identifier for the transcription request.
id.title: Id

created_at.description: UTC timestamp indicating when the transcription was created.
created_at.title: Created At

model.description: Speech-to-text model used for the transcription.
model.title: Model

audio_url.description: URL of the file being transcribed.
audio_url.title: Audio Url

file_id.description: ID of the file being transcribed.
file_id.title: File Id

filename.description: Name of the file being transcribed.
filename.title: Filename

language_hints.description: Expected languages in the audio. If not specified, languages are automatically detected.
language_hints.title: Language Hints

enable_speaker_diarization.description: When `true`, speakers are identified and separated in the transcription output.
enable_speaker_diarization.title: Enable Speaker Diarization

enable_language_identification.description: When `true`, language is detected for each part of the transcription.
enable_language_identification.title: Enable Language Identification

audio_duration_ms.description: Duration of the audio in milliseconds. Only available after processing begins.
audio_duration_ms.title: Audio Duration Ms

error_type.description: Error type if transcription failed. `null` for successful or in-progress transcriptions.
error_type.title: Error Type

error_message.description: Error message if transcription failed. `null` for successful or in-progress transcriptions.
error_message.title: Error Message

webhook_url.description: URL to receive webhook notifications when transcription is completed or fails.
webhook_url.title: Webhook Url

webhook_auth_header_name.description: Name of the authentication header sent with webhook notifications.
webhook_auth_header_name.title: Webhook Auth Header Name

webhook_auth_header_value.description: Authentication header value. Always returned masked as `******************`.
webhook_auth_header_value.title: Webhook Auth Header Value

webhook_status_code.description: HTTP status code received from your server when webhook was delivered. `null` if not yet sent.
webhook_status_code.title: Webhook Status Code

model.description: Speech-to-text model to use for the transcription.
model.title: Model

audio_url.description: URL of the audio file to transcribe. Cannot be specified if `file_id` is specified.
audio_url.title: Audio Url

file_id.description: ID of the uploaded file to transcribe. Cannot be specified if `audio_url` is specified.
file_id.title: File Id

language_hints.description: Expected languages in the audio. If not specified, languages are automatically detected.
language_hints.title: Language Hints

language_hints_strict.description: When `true`, the model will rely more on language hints.
language_hints_strict.title: Language Hints Strict

enable_speaker_diarization.description: When `true`, speakers are identified and separated in the transcription output.
enable_speaker_diarization.title: Enable Speaker Diarization

enable_language_identification.description: When `true`, language is detected for each part of the transcription.
enable_language_identification.title: Enable Language Identification

context.description: Additional context to improve transcription accuracy and formatting of specialized terms.
context.title: Context

webhook_url.description: URL to receive webhook notifications when transcription is completed or fails.
webhook_url.title: Webhook Url

webhook_auth_header_name.description: Name of the authentication header sent with webhook notifications.
webhook_auth_header_name.title: Webhook Auth Header Name

webhook_auth_header_value.description: Authentication header value sent with webhook notifications.
webhook_auth_header_value.title: Webhook Auth Header Value

client_reference_id.description: Optional tracking identifier string. Does not need to be unique.
client_reference_id.title: Client Reference Id

terms.description: Terms that might occur in speech.
terms.title: Terms

translation_terms.description: Hints how to translate specific terms. Ignored if translation is not enabled.
translation_terms.title: Translation Terms

id.description: Unique identifier of the transcription this transcript belongs to.
id.title: Id

tokens.description: List of detailed token information with timestamps and metadata.
tokens.title: Tokens

start_ms.description: Start time of the token in milliseconds.
start_ms.title: Start Ms

end_ms.description: End time of the token in milliseconds.
end_ms.title: End Ms

confidence.description: Confidence score of the token, between 0.0 and 1.0.
confidence.title: Confidence

speaker.description: Speaker identifier. Only present when speaker diarization is enabled.
speaker.title: Speaker

language.description: Detected language code for this token. Only present when language identification is enabled.
language.title: Language

is_audio_event.description: Boolean indicating if this token represents an audio event. Only present when audio event detection is enabled.
is_audio_event.title: Is Audio Event

translation_status.description: Translation status ("none", "original" or "translation"). Only when if translation is enabled.
translation_status.title: Translation Status

models.description: List of available models and their attributes.
models.title: Models

aliased_model_id.description: If this is an alias, the id of the aliased model.
aliased_model_id.title: Aliased Model Id

languages.description: List of languages supported by the model.
languages.title: Languages

translation_targets.description: List of supported one-way translation targets. If list is empty, check for one_way_translation field
translation_targets.title: Translation Targets

two_way_translation_pairs.description: List of supported two-way translation pairs.  If list is empty, check for two_way_translation field
two_way_translation_pairs.title: Two Way Translation Pairs

one_way_translation.description: When contains string 'all_languages', any laguage from languages can be used
one_way_translation.title: One Way Translation

two_way_translation.description: When contains string 'all_languages',' any laguage pair from languages can be used
two_way_translation.title: Two Way Translation

expires_at.description: UTC timestamp indicating when generated temporary API key will expire.
expires_at.title: Expires At

usage_type.description: Intended usage of the temporary API key.

expires_in_seconds.description: Duration in seconds until the temporary API key expires.
expires_in_seconds.title: Expires In Seconds

client_reference_id.description: Optional tracking identifier string. Does not need to be unique.
client_reference_id.title: Client Reference Id
